title: Set of Two 2 3/4 Inch High Decorative Hand Painted Yellow Sunflower Short White Pillar Candles Fall Boho Bohemian Decor
features: Pair of Unscented Short Pillar Candles

description: A pair of decorative short pillar candles featuring hand-painted yellow sunflower designs to add artful Boho personality to your home! The whimsical flowers are painted onto each of the white pillars using quality paints in warm yellow tones and the golden-green leaves are the perfect accents! Placed on a dining room or kitchen table, this set will add soft, dancing light and flowery Bohemian style to your home! Set of Two Pillar Candles, 2 3/4" high, 2 1/2" wide **your set of candles arrives to you in a gift bag, tied with a pretty bow!** **FAST FREE US/REDUCED INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING**
